data.product_description: AI-Powered based Marketing Automation- Automate and personalize your end-to-end customer experience, across all your digital properties and channels.

initial_reviews.review_title: All you need for your business in one place!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Segmentino?
Segmentino is an excellent marketing platform with many functions in one platform. Push notifications, email marketing, and message marketing are super functions with simple dashboards. You can try it for free to your satisfaction and use it.

What do you dislike about Segmentino?
Almost all functions are very suitable for marketing in Segmentino. Perhaps the negative argument is that Segmentino does not support whatsapp, but it is not so important.

What problems is Segmentino solving and how is that benefiting you?
Measuring the campaign performance is made easy through the intuitive dashboard and it helps in improving them to suit the users need better, and being so intuitive saves you time and money.

initial_reviews.review_title: A top tier Marketing Automation tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Segmentino?
Setting up and executing is phenomenally simple for my group! Great campaign features, allowing you to quickly and seamlessly segment your audience. Allowing you to track a lead is a breeze with Segmentino throughout the entire life cycle! Allows us to see what is and is not working so that we can make the most of our marketing budget.

What do you dislike about Segmentino?
I generally like every aspect of this software, but when doing complicated tasks, I find it can be a bit slow / non sensitive. Typically when I do a lot of smart lists, it slows down or lags a bit. Generally, coverage could also be enhanced. It works fine as it is, but an upgrade is required.

Recommendations to others considering Segmentino:
If you want your marketing strategies to be lean and successful, implement Segmentino today!

What problems is Segmentino solving and how is that benefiting you?
This helps our sales team to work faster and more efficiently. Automation allows us to have dynamic workflows that are so important to our multi-channel campaigns. It helps us to report in depth on the progress of each of the campaigns from start to finish.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Segmentino?
review_question_answers.answer: Setting up and executing is phenomenally simple for my group! Great campaign features, allowing you to quickly and seamlessly segment your audience. Allowing you to track a lead is a breeze with Segmentino throughout the entire life cycle! Allows us to see what is and is not working so that we can make the most of our marketing budget.

review_question_answers.answer: I generally like every aspect of this software, but when doing complicated tasks, I find it can be a bit slow / non sensitive. Typically when I do a lot of smart lists, it slows down or lags a bit. Generally, coverage could also be enhanced. It works fine as it is, but an upgrade is required.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Segmentino:
review_question_answers.answer: If you want your marketing strategies to be lean and successful, implement Segmentino today!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Segmentino solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: This helps our sales team to work faster and more efficiently. Automation allows us to have dynamic workflows that are so important to our multi-channel campaigns. It helps us to report in depth on the progress of each of the campaigns from start to finish.

initial_reviews.review_title: Small learning curve to endless possibilities
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Segmentino?
I used a variety of marketing automation software, including WebEngage and Hubspot, and Segmentino's simplicity is what I like most about it. Unlike other marketing automation tools, the ability to build complex campaigns and segment audiences is next level. In addition, the scalability and the ability to automate workflows makes Segmentino a great tool for teams.

What do you dislike about Segmentino?
Segmentino has an immense learning curve since here's always more than one way to tackle an issue, and some people may be scared off. I'm still learning more about this software, although at this stage I've been using it for nearly half a year. The upside is a lot of training and support which is provided by Segmentino team to overcome this matter.

Recommendations to others considering Segmentino:
It is probably the best Marketing Automation in all aspects of costs and services, but I'd suggest you have someone fully on it and connect them with Segmentino's success manager to get most out of its features.

What problems is Segmentino solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am sure that Segmentino helps to improve sales and marketing coordination. Using sales Intelligence, it is easy to pass information directly to the sales team through the CRM. In addition, the analysis and the lifecycle template are helpful for us to recognize where people are in the funnel and how our campaign strategy can be strengthened to better target them.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Segmentino?
review_question_answers.answer: I used a variety of marketing automation software, including WebEngage and Hubspot, and Segmentino's simplicity is what I like most about it. Unlike other marketing automation tools, the ability to build complex campaigns and segment audiences is next level. In addition, the scalability and the ability to automate workflows makes Segmentino a great tool for teams.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Segmentino?
review_question_answers.answer: Segmentino has an immense learning curve since here's always more than one way to tackle an issue, and some people may be scared off. review_question_answers.answer: I am sure that Segmentino helps to improve sales and marketing coordination. Using sales Intelligence, it is easy to pass information directly to the sales team through the CRM. In addition, the analysis and the lifecycle template are helpful for us to recognize where people are in the funnel and how our campaign strategy can be strengthened to better target them.

initial_reviews.review_title: Relieved our pain of using multiple products
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Segmentino?
I have been using multiple products in recent years for managing customers, deals, contacts, and segmenting them into proper categories and I saw each one being good at some part and lacked the others. We lately switched to Segmentino and so far I am happy to have this all in one solution. Our organization is now not using the whole features because of the nature of our business, but I am really happy that we have this automated solutions that handles our events, contacts, and campaigns itself and we can spare time to focus on our core business.

What do you dislike about Segmentino?
There is nothing much for sure on this, but I think Segmentino can fine tune the UX in the future.

What problems is Segmentino solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation of our campaigns and dealing with customers.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Segmentino?
review_question_answers.answer: I have been using multiple products in recent years for managing customers, deals, contacts, and segmenting them into proper categories and I saw each one being good at some part and lacked the others. We lately switched to Segmentino and so far I am happy to have this all in one solution. Our organization is now not using the whole features because of the nature of our business, but I am really happy that we have this automated solutions that handles our events, contacts, and campaigns itself and we can spare time to focus on our core business.

review_question_answers.answer: There is nothing much for sure on this, but I think Segmentino can fine tune the UX in the future.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Segmentino solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Automation of our campaigns and dealing with customers.

all_reviews.review_title: A top tier Marketing Automation tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Segmentino?
Setting up and executing is phenomenally simple for my group! Great campaign features, allowing you to quickly and seamlessly segment your audience. Allowing you to track a lead is a breeze with Segmentino throughout the entire life cycle! Allows us to see what is and is not working so that we can make the most of our marketing budget.

What do you dislike about Segmentino?
I generally like every aspect of this software, but when doing complicated tasks, I find it can be a bit slow / non sensitive. Typically when I do a lot of smart lists, it slows down or lags a bit. Generally, coverage could also be enhanced. It works fine as it is, but an upgrade is required.

Recommendations to others considering Segmentino:
If you want your marketing strategies to be lean and successful, implement Segmentino today!

What problems is Segmentino solving and how is that benefiting you?
This helps our sales team to work faster and more efficiently. Automation allows us to have dynamic workflows that are so important to our multi-channel campaigns. It helps us to report in depth on the progress of each of the campaigns from start to finish.

all_reviews.review_title: Small learning curve to endless possibilities
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Segmentino?
I used a variety of marketing automation software, including WebEngage and Hubspot, and Segmentino's simplicity is what I like most about it. Unlike other marketing automation tools, the ability to build complex campaigns and segment audiences is next level. In addition, the scalability and the ability to automate workflows makes Segmentino a great tool for teams.

What do you dislike about Segmentino?
Segmentino has an immense learning curve since here's always more than one way to tackle an issue, and some people may be scared off. I'm still learning more about this software, although at this stage I've been using it for nearly half a year. The upside is a lot of training and support which is provided by Segmentino team to overcome this matter.

Recommendations to others considering Segmentino:
It is probably the best Marketing Automation in all aspects of costs and services, but I'd suggest you have someone fully on it and connect them with Segmentino's success manager to get most out of its features.

What problems is Segmentino solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am sure that Segmentino helps to improve sales and marketing coordination. Using sales Intelligence, it is easy to pass information directly to the sales team through the CRM. In addition, the analysis and the lifecycle template are helpful for us to recognize where people are in the funnel and how our campaign strategy can be strengthened to better target them.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Segmentino?
review_question_answers.answer: I used a variety of marketing automation software, including WebEngage and Hubspot, and Segmentino's simplicity is what I like most about it. Unlike other marketing automation tools, the ability to build complex campaigns and segment audiences is next level. In addition, the scalability and the ability to automate workflows makes Segmentino a great tool for teams.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Segmentino?
review_question_answers.answer: Segmentino has an immense learning curve since here's always more than one way to tackle an issue, and some people may be scared off. I'm still learning more about this software, although at this stage I've been using it for nearly half a year. The upside is a lot of training and support which is provided by Segmentino team to overcome this matter.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Segmentino:
review_question_answers.answer: It is probably the best Marketing Automation in all aspects of costs and services, but I'd suggest you have someone fully on it and connect them with Segmentino's success manager to get most out of its features.

review_question_answers.answer: I am sure that Segmentino helps to improve sales and marketing coordination. Using sales Intelligence, it is easy to pass information directly to the sales team through the CRM. In addition, the analysis and the lifecycle template are helpful for us to recognize where people are in the funnel and how our campaign strategy can be strengthened to better target them.

all_reviews.review_title: Relieved our pain of using multiple products
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Segmentino?
I have been using multiple products in recent years for managing customers, deals, contacts, and segmenting them into proper categories and I saw each one being good at some part and lacked the others. We lately switched to Segmentino and so far I am happy to have this all in one solution. Our organization is now not using the whole features because of the nature of our business, but I am really happy that we have this automated solutions that handles our events, contacts, and campaigns itself and we can spare time to focus on our core business.

What do you dislike about Segmentino?
There is nothing much for sure on this, but I think Segmentino can fine tune the UX in the future.

What problems is Segmentino solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation of our campaigns and dealing with customers.
